item.title: Math
item.description: Preprints and Publications Stability conditions on blowups, arxiv:2503.23682 Stability Conditions on $\mathbb{P}^3$ (joint with Dongjian Wu), arxiv:2408.00519 Talks 2025.05.15, Bogomolov-type inequalities and Bridgeland stability conditions on threefolds, Kavli IPMU GTM Seminar 2024.11.27, Global dimension of geometric stability condition, BIMSA-YMSC Geometry and Dynamics Seminar (Slides) 2022.11.21, Applications of quasimap theory in enumerative geometry, Tsinghua Preprint Seminar 2022.02.24, Motivic degree zero Donaldson-Thomas invariants, Enumerative Geometry Learning Seminar Seminars and Visitings 2025.06.30-2025.07.11, 2025

item.title: Nonsense
item.description: وسھلا‎ أھلا ‎この 文章 were written sans raison. 中文 English Français 日本語 作为文学爱好者：我喜欢寓言式的精炼的富有想象力的作品。列举几个我喜欢的作家
